You can also choose to save the pictures to your smartphone.It makes for an amazing, funny and sexy app!Download this app to prank your friends into thinking you can see their UNDERWEAR!===========Instructions===========Start the UndressCode app and aim your smartphone at one or more persons:â Verify that your smartphone is in a vertical position.â Make sure the person is standing straight, facing you, and don't tilt their head.â Now just tap the camera button and wait for the magic to happen!â Save the photo on your smartphone!
